description.text:
At 4th level, the windstep master can spend 1 point from his ki pool as a swift action to sustain his wind step for 1 minute. During this time, the windstep master can remain airborne even if he doesn't reach a solid surface.
He can also spend 1 point from his ki pool as a swift action to increase his wind step distance by 20 feet for 1 round.
The windstep master does not gain the ability to spend ki to increase his base speed by 20 feet for 1 round.
